WeOnBikes | Story - Warum wir Radfahren: WeOnBikes | Story - Why we love cycling
Mit WeOnBikes - Life by bicycle möchten: With WeOnBikes - Life by bicycle, we want to promote cycling as a means of travel and a means of transport in everyday life. Because cycling makes you happy, saves time and money and protects the environment.
Radfahren ist gesund: Cycling is good for your health
möchten wir Radfahren als Reisemittel un: we want to promote cycling as a means of travel and a means of transport in everyday life.
Wie wir das erreichen wollen: How we want to achieve this
Wir werden regelmäßig zu verschiedenen T: We will post regularly on various topics:
Fahrradleben - Fahrrad als Lifestyle, In: Bike life: bike as inspiration and mood-lifter
Fahrrad-Infrastruktur und Stadtentwicklu: Bicycle infrastructure and urban development for active mobility
Fahrradreparatur und Werkzeug unterwegs: Bike repair and tools on the road
Radtypen wie Mountainbikes, Gravel-Bikes: Bike types like Mountain bikes, Gravel bikes, Trekking bikes and bike tech, geometry
Fahrradtaschen - Bikepacking versus klas: Bikebags – bikepacking versus classical bike panniers
Radrouten - Fernradwege und kürzere Fahr: Bike routes - long-distance bike trails and shorter bike rides, GPS routes
Reiseplanung von Radreisen und Fahrradto: Travel planning of bike trips and tours
Training - ist das wichtig vor der Radre: Training – is it important before a bike trip?
Du kannst uns auf verschiedene Arten unt: You can support us in various ways:
Erzähle uns deine Geschichte oder mach u: Tell us your story or suggest an interesting topic
Schau dir unsere Downloads an und inspir: Look at our downloads and inspire others toward a bike life
